title: District Profile: NH Republican Calls For 'New Generation' of Leaders
teaser: Incumbent Democrat Ann Mclane Kuster is facing a challenge from Republican Marilinda Garcia in New Hampshire's Second Congressional District.
contentencoded:
In this week’s District Profile, we turn to New Hampshire’s second congressional district where incumbent Democrat Ann Mclane Kuster is facing a challenge from Republican Marilinda Garcia, who says Congress needs a “new generation of conservative leaders.”

From the Here & Now Contributors Network, New Hampshire Public Radio’s Josh Rogers joins Jeremy Hobson to discuss the race.

  • See more District Profiles

Guest

  • Josh Rogers, political reporter for NHPR. He tweets @joshrogersNHPR.
